item.title: Voabulary booster pack: German words that mean 'drunk'
item.description: Depending on your stereotypes of German speakers, you may or may not be surprised to learn that there are a lot of words that mean “drunk” in German. This post walks through 18 of them as well as words for discussing the aftermath of a night out. I’ve also put them together as a neat set of Anki cards so you might have a shot at remembering them when the time comes.
